amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to ensure timely payback for advanced funds paid for by a non-federal sponsor.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Sanford.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
